TEAM

  • TARAS ROZGON

    Founder and director

    For more than seven years Taras is a successful manager and director of 'Life Art Properties' — the well-known real-estate agency. Now he is creating a safe scheme for rental services using the newest technologies and his great experience.

  • ANDREY POPOV

    Co-founder and technical director

    Since 2003 Andrey has been working in the IT-sector and he is a founder of 'Webdelo' project team. This experience helped him to develop the complex web-based project that supports the whole range of company’s activities.

  • ANDREY ZHUMATY

    Co-founder and advertising director

    It is most likely that because of his team work you are now reading this text! Andrey is always open for any offers to cooperate with our project!

  • SVETLANA ROZGON

    Co-founder and customer support director

    Did you get a polite respond when you called us? Did you get all the answers? If yes — that means her hard work gave its results. If no — tell her about the problem. Rest assured: she will deal with it./p>

    Email: s.rozgon@vput.eu

  • DMITRI CERCEL

    Chief developer

    A huge amount of time devoted to the study of modern technologies allows Dmitri to maintain high standards. His talent and hard work inspire the whole team to look for new solutions of challenges that our developers meet.

Идеи, предложения и пожелания

Для нас очень важен ваш отзыв о нашем проекте, а также мы рады любым идеям и предложениям со стороны наших клиентов.

А авторы особо интересных идей не останутся «безнаказанными»!
